channel.title: Home on ARGOS DB 2
channel.description: Recent content in Home on ARGOS DB 2

item.title: About
item.description: ARGOS2 DB What is ARGOS2? “FDA and collaborators established the publicly available database, FDA dAtabase for Regulatory-Grade micrObial Sequences (FDA-ARGOS), to fill these defined quality gaps for diagnostic relevant genomes. The goal of FDA-ARGOS is to generate and make publicly available near finished genomes of sufficient quality for diagnostic purposes. Here, we present the first subset of 487 FDA-ARGOS genomes with NCBI accessions”" Sichtig, H., Minogue, T., Yan, Y.
